| HistoryText             = The Legion of Light was a secret religious group led by [[Achmed Korba (Earth-616)|Brother Power]] and his wife [[Sha Shan Nguyen (Earth-616)|Sister Sun]]. The Legion of Light and its followes would spurn all their worldly possessions. They followed the message that light and love was power. In reality, however, its true purpose was to gather people who could then be manipulated as pawns of the [[Man-Beast (Earth-616)|Man-Beast]].{{r|Peter Parker, The Spectacular Spider-Man Vol 1 12|15}}

The Man-Beast was eventually defeated by [[Spider-Man (Peter Parker)|Spider Man]] and [[Eugene Thompson (Earth-616)|Flash Thompson]], and Sha Shan was freed from the mission imposed by her father, as Achmed died in an explosion.{{r|Peter Parker, The Spectacular Spider-Man Vol 1 15}}
